Belthassan still looked somewhat stunned from the accident.

Belthassan: If that is what you mean, I mean no harm. I am 
Belthassan, second in command of the Tripredacus. I would like to 
know who you are, as well as what happened to the ambassador.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> -- Anachronox --
> 
> Anachronox looks down at unlucky bot who was pinned down by the 
cover 
> of the renewal chamber. He is instantly defensive and prepared to 
> react, though he doesn't show it. His brain analyzes the situation, 
> <No hostile actions detected, apparently a plea for help... all 
> things considered, I've got no reason not to help him.>
> 
> The large bot reaches down, grasps the obstruction, and his four 
> strong legs easily drag it off of Belthassan. He releases the piece, 
> and the side of his head observes the other bot. 
> 
> "And who are YOU?" He grunts with a slight emphasis on the you, 
> showing some of his confusion, "Friend of foe?" He crouches, tensing 
> up, although only the observant would notice it.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Belthassan, worried by the sounds he had heard, was now underneath 
> the 
> >  former top of the Renewal Chamber. He tried to raise himself, 
> making 
> > the thing move, but he could not get out.
> > 
> > Belthassan: Ouch... That hurts... (He sees and hears the new robot 
> > throughout the broken glass) Anachronox... Is that your name? Help 
> me, 
> > please, I am stuck here...
